meanings.definition: A person who owns or operates a garage.
meanings.sent1: The garageman opened the garage doors early every morning.
meanings.sent2: My neighbor is a garageman and takes care of all the cars in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The garageman joked that his garage was so clean, you could eat off the floor!
meanings.sent4: The garageman's dedication to his work was like a shining beacon in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the friendly smile of the garageman whenever I visited the garage.

meanings.definition: A person who repairs or services vehicles in a garage.
meanings.sent1: The garageman fixed my car's engine in no time.
meanings.sent2: When my car broke down, I knew I could count on the garageman to help.
meanings.sent3: The garageman pretended to talk to the car as if it were whispering its troubles to him.
meanings.sent4: The garageman's hands worked magic on the vehicles that came into the garage.
meanings.sent5: The garageman's expertise turned my old car into a smooth-running machine.
